job.command:
cd /afs/rhic.bnl.gov/star/packages/repository/offline/paper/psn0471/Data
cd ../ root4star -q -b St_ehcorrelation.C\(0,$INPUTFILECOUNT,\"$FILELIST\",\"$SCRATCH\",\"_$JOBID\"\) root4star -q -b St_ehcorrelation.C\(10,$INPUTFILECOUNT,\"$FILELIST\",\"$SCRATCH\",\"_$JOBID\"\) rm core* cd Sublist/ rm sched*$JOBID*
